1.0.name: wordpress/stop-cispa-ribbon
1.0.description: A black ribbon with the words "Stop CISPA" will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the Stop CISPA website. You can specify a vertical offset depending on whether the Wordpress toolbar is showing. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop CISPA entry in the BowieRocks.com news too. Thank you for showing your support!
